caption.p: Y-A-S strategies, underlying traits and tools to extract trait information

td.p: - Omics (genomics, transcriptomics, proteomics): markers not known but likely central carbon metabolism, amino acid, fatty acid, and nucleotide synthesis.
- Stable isotope tracing into biomass and respired CO 2*
- Omics: Glycoside hydrolase genes, other CAZy database genes, genes for extracellular enzymes

tr.td: - Omics: genes for flagellar motility, chemotaxis
- Omics: σ factors, molecular chaperons eg. Chaperonin GroEL, DnaK
- Omics + metabolomics*: markers for synthesis of trehalose, glycine betaine, amino acids related to osmotic stress
- Omics: markers for synthesis of extracellular polysaccharide
- Omics: markers for synthesis of cell walls

table-wrap-foot.p: Asterisk represents quantifiable physiological assays that directly measure phenotypic traits
